title: Dumb American Gothic, Disney’s Third Degree Racism 7.1.20
itunes:title: Dumb American Gothic, Disney’s Third Degree Racism 7.1.20
description:
In episode 663, Jack and Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the murder of Elijah McClain by the Colorado police, Trump sharing videos of armed white couple confronting protestors, two Trump tell-all books coming out, Disneyland changing Splash Mountain, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Colorado Police Investigate Officers Over Photos Taken Near Elijah McClain Site
  2. Colorado officers probed over photos of them at Elijah McClain memorial
  3. Trump Shares Video of Armed White Couple Confronting Protesters
  4. In the Race for Trump Tell-Alls, Simon & Schuster Is Leading
  5. DISNEYLAND DELAYED AND SPLASH MOUNTAIN MAKES SOME BIG CHANGES
  6. Grown Local Podcast
  7. WATCH: Haim - 3am (Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
